name: Vela Astralis (2021)
description:
Graduation Video Game
School : ISART DIGITAL, the Video Game and 3D Animation / VFX School

Master the winds and explore the remnants of a desertic world in your sailing vehicle to unravel the mysteries of a lost planet.

Platform: PC
Engine: Unity
Number of players: 1
Genre: Action 

3D Environment Artist : Athénais ACQUAVIVA
Game & Level Designer & Scripter : Jessy CALOS
Game & Level Designer & Scripter : Gaspard DAUVILLIER
Game & Level Designer : Loris EPALLE
3D Artist/ UI : Alexandre HARRELLE
Project manager & Game Designer : Clifford KAM THONG
Game Designer & Scripter : Louis LAUZET
3D Environment Artist / Texture Artist : Jacob LEDUC
Game Designer & Scripter : Thomas LEROUX
Narrative Designer & Scripter : Melissa MARCHAND
Game/Level Designer : Justin PALLIERE
3D Vehicule Artist / Lookdev : Antoine RAMPALY
Game/UI Designer : Anthony TEIXEIRA
